#libraries
```{r}
library(haven)
library(skimr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


#pull in dataset
```{r}

kenya_dataset <- read_dta("data/lab_1_kenya.dta")
```
#this is a change submitted as a pull request
#showing you a change here
#explore dataset
```{r}
head(kenya_dataset)
```


```{r}
skim(kenya_dataset)
```


```{r}
kenya <- kenya_dataset %>%
  mutate(bord5 = NA)
    
kenya <- kenya %>%
  mutate(bord5 = case_when(
    bord <5 ~ "0",
    bord >=5 ~ "1",
  TRUE~NA_character_
  ))
  
```

```{r}
skim(kenya$bord5
     )

table(kenya$bord5)

```

#create histogram
```{r}
hist(kenya$bord , main = "Birth Order", xlab = "Age", ylab = "Number")
```
